thread.title: Edmonton Eskimos edge Winnipeg Blue Bombers on last play [Photos]
thread.title_full: Edmonton Eskimos edge Winnipeg Blue Bombers on last play [Photos]

title: Edmonton Eskimos edge Winnipeg Blue Bombers on last play [Photos]
text:
By Gerry Moddejonge , Edmonton Sun First posted: Saturday, October 03, 2015 09:14 PM EDT | Updated: Sunday, October 04, 2015 12:47 AM EDT Photos; Eskimos versus Bombers Oct. 3, 2015 
Edmonton Eskimos QB Mike Reilly celebrates his touchdown pass to WR Kenny Stafford during CFL action against the Winnipeg Blue Bombers at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Edmonton Eskimos SB Adarius Bowman hauls in a pass during CFL action against the Winnipeg Blue Bombers at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Winnipeg Blue Bombers WR Darvin Adams catches a pass against the Edmonton Eskimos during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Winnipeg Blue Bombers kicker Lirim Hajrullahu (centre) celebrates with holder Brian Brohm and Troy Stoudemire after making a late field to take a lead over the Edmonton Eskimos during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Winnipeg Blue Bombers' Cameron Marshall (32) runs the ball in for the touchdown against the Edmonton Eskimos during the second half of CFL action in Winnipeg Saturday, October 3, 2015. THE CANADIAN PRESS/John Woods THE CANADIAN PRESS 
Edmonton Eskimos QB Mike Reilly throws under pressure during CFL action against the Winnipeg Blue Bombers at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Winnipeg Blue Bombers LB Sam Hurl (10) celebrates a sack of Edmonton Eskimos QB along with DE Jamaal Westerman during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Winnipeg Blue Bombers DB Johnny Adams celebrates breaking up a pass against the Edmonton Eskimos during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Winnipeg Blue Bombers kicker Lirim Hajrullahu is dejected after missing his fourth field goal against the Edmonton Eskimos during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. He also missed a convert in a 24-23 loss. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Winnipeg Blue Bombers KR Troy Stoudemire handles a punt against the Edmonton Eskimos during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Winnipeg Blue Bombers RB Cameron Marshall scores a rushing touchdown against the Edmonton Eskimos during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Edmonton Eskimos kicker Sean Whyte (top) is mobbed by teammates after a 53-yard field goal on the final play of the game to beat the Winnipeg Blue Bombers during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Edmonton Eskimos kicker Sean Whyte (top) is hoisted up by teammates after a 53-yard field goal on the final play of the game to beat the Winnipeg Blue Bombers during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Edmonton Eskimos kicker Sean Whyte (top) celebrates a 53-yard field goal on the final play of the game to beat the Winnipeg Blue Bombers during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Winnipeg Blue Bombers kicker Lirim Hajrullahu celebrates after making a late field to take a lead over the Edmonton Eskimos during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Winnipeg Blue Bombers KR Troy Stoudemire handles a punt against the Edmonton Eskimos during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Winnipeg Blue Bombers kicker Lirim Hajrullahu walks away while Edmonton Eskimos DL Odell Willis celebrates a missed field goal during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Winnipeg Blue Bombers WR Rory Kohlert finds open filed after a catch during CFL action against the Edmonton Eskimos at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun 
Edmonton Eskimos kicker Sean Whyte (top) celebrates his 53-yard field goal on the final play of the game to beat the Winnipeg Blue Bombers during CFL action at Investors Group Field in Winnipeg on Sat., Oct. 3, 2015. Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun/Postmedia Network Kevin King/Winnipeg Sun
